title: Please let GP Laugh again during ult.
body:
You ruined him. First you acknowledge how important laughs are by adding it to Singed's Fling (GREAT CHANGE) then you COMPLETELY RUIN gangplank by reducing his ult epicness by AT LEAST 200%.

I refuse to play the rework untill the sound is changed back to the laughter. Please join me in this.

replies.body: GP does laugh during his ult.

> [{quoted}](name=ElJanitorFrank,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=EV681l1E,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-07-27T22:55:48.406+0000)
>
> GP does laugh during his ult.

ya he doesnt laugh during ult, idk what OP is talking about. i admit its not as good as old GPs laugh, but he DOES laugh.
It's not the same though. The new laugh is more of a half-hearted chuckle, the old one came from deep in the chest. I really wish they had kept the old laugh for his ult even with the new voiceover.

The old one felt like it always had an omniscient presence.  It echoed loudly, had a kind of spectral tinge to it like some surreal being had just called own fire on your head.

It felt way more like he was watching from atop a cloud and waiting to smite you from above.  He just feels like he has less presence.

Yeah, but isn't that a little strange?  I mean, GPs ENTIRE identity was simple:  Pirate.

It's kinda sad that's all he was known for, but thats what it was.  Whenever I think pirates, nothing at all makes me think, 'otherworldly being sitting atop a cloud smiting you from the heavens'.
No. But most pirates also can't call cannon fire down on you on top of a bloody mountain...
Most pirates don't carry a stockroom full of barrels in their asses either :P

New laugh can't compare in any way to the old one.

The old one was way more in line with MF's ult laugh. New one is so very lackluster, like it's an afterthought that they even put it in there.
Daily reminder Veigar still doesn't laugh when he ults and kills someone with it.
...I thought he did. I've definitely heard Veigar laughing after using his ultimate.
those are the Veigar mains that bind laugh and R to the same button from what I've heard.
No, I thought that when he kills someone with his ultimate he laughs.
Yes, it is *supposed* to do that, but that got removed accidentally some time around when he received "compensation" for DFG's removal, and last I checked it wasn't back yet.
But if you dont laugh 24/7 as veigar you are doing it wrong. I dont even take a full step without laughter!

plz, let teemo laugh when someone steps on a shroom for it's full duration

btw, daily reminder that Gangplank isn't still a scurvy pirate (yaaargh)

lmao i love it

would definitely increase his global presence
He does laugh.... ya dip
He does laugh, just a different laugh than the old
Pirates need to laugh during their ult. Imagine MF ult without the laugh...same goes for GP.

Knowing direction of his update they would gladly put epic laugh... into his E.

Just like they put everything else.
I thought they were leaving it on his ult? I don't wanna go hunting for the thread where some Red said they were keeping it because it was cool, but I'm certain I saw it. >>
Put his old laugh in for good measure aswell

I thought the worst part was when they took out my favorite joke in the game....

Now me roger is no longer jolly when i play gp.
new GP doesn't even laugh when he laughs... rip

topkeg.

Although really, I completely agree.
Maybe you should try playing the live rework before complaining about it.... he only didn't laugh in the ability previews because of the editing....
